website_summaries.verdict: The lightweight construction and extremely breathable feature of the shoe made most of the wearers really satisfied. The shoe is packed with technologies needed for a better road running experience.  The shoe provides a good combination of comfort, cushioning, and versatility.
pros: Most wearers made positive remarks about the shoe’s lightweight nature
According to some runners, Under Armour Charged CoolSwitch is extremely breathable because of the presence of the 360° ventilation that was extended to the outsole unit of the shoe
More than a few testers mentioned that the shoe was able to provide durable cushioning for long-distance runs
A few wearers said that the shoe was easy to put on
The Charged CoolSwitch is comfortable to wear, said few runners
Some testers were highly appreciative of the shoe’s appealing aesthetic design
A couple of purchasers mentioned that the shoe is affordable
Based on a few user reviews, the shoe is very versatile
users mentioned that they were able to use the shoe during gym training and on casual walks
Another user with painful nerve issues in his feet noted that he had a painless running experience with the Charged CoolSwitch
cons: One customer mentioned that small stones and dirt get trapped in the perforations of the sole unit
The upper material is too thin and absorbs too much water, according to a couple of wearers

customer_reviews.title: Its basically a slip-on shoe with laces. Don't know ...
customer_reviews.text: Its basically a slip-on shoe with laces. Don't know how the shoe is on the road--too small to even try. I ordered the same size I always do in UA, the style runs small AND Narrow
customer_reviews.author: Keisha

customer_reviews.title: Awful
customer_reviews.text: Wow these shoes suck. They’re thin and have no support for arches or anything. Awkwardly placed bottom hard parts hurt my bottom half of foot will be returning
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Lusignan

customer_reviews.title: fabric is a bit thin. wont give much support ...
customer_reviews.text: fabric is a bit thin. wont give much support and hope the big toe doesnt come thru the front. Fit is decent.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Ives

customer_reviews.title: A bit narrow
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 similar Under Armor pairs to see which one I liked better and this one was my first choice but was a bit narrow so had to return
customer_reviews.author: BeNo

customer_reviews.title: buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: I've worn UA shoes for years and their product is always true to size. Sizing is waaaaaaay off (2 sizes smaller than true size). This tells me these products are defect stock, womens shoes or counterfeits.
customer_reviews.author: JGD

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: These are nice. I sized up a half size on these and fit good. I never size up either at all so I believe these run a tad bit small. I agree with other reviewers as well about since there is no tongue they are extremely hard to slip your foot /heel through. The hole is so small!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Order at least a half size larger than you normall would...
customer_reviews.text: If I didn't have slender feet I am not sure these would even fit... I ordered a half size larger than needed and still had troubles getting my foot into the actual shoe. They are comforable once you have them on though. Just kind of a poor design as far as actually putting the shoe on.
customer_reviews.author: shawnajab

customer_reviews.title: Very difficult to put on.
customer_reviews.text: I had to return these because I could not get them on my foot! The opening for your foot to slid in cannot be loosened because the shoes don’t have a tongue. The opening was a little stretchy but it was just way too difficult to get the shoes on. They did seem very breathable and were super light so I was disappointed to have to return them. Also, you really can’t wear them with socks.
customer_reviews.author: G Driskell

customer_reviews.title: Struggle to put on
customer_reviews.text: Could not slip foot into shoe without struggle. Not comfortable. Fit small
customer_reviews.author: Sandwell, a

customer_reviews.title: Fit is small
customer_reviews.text: I returned. I wear a women’s 9. The shoe fit me, did not fit my son which wears a men’s 10 and what I bought.
customer_reviews.author: J.  Gibson

customer_reviews.title: Good shoes!
customer_reviews.text: If you run a lot and you work out get the shoes! I love them The only thing I have a problem with them is I run a lot in the dirt and they get stained very easily so don’t get the white ones or the gray ones but I do recommend getting these shoes
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Tiemeyer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, light weight workout shoes!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE these shoes! Very comfortable. Light weight. Has a good base so that I can stay balanced while working out. Only thing that was unexpected was that around the ankle they are very fitted and have that sock like fit to them. But the color is gorgeous and I wore them this morning during my workout and they held up great and my ankles didn’t hurt!
customer_reviews.author: Haley

customer_reviews.title: Not a great design for a slip on.
customer_reviews.text: These are really a poor design. I would really like them if I could get my foot in them. The opening needs to be bigger for people with a higher instep.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Conforming to feet
customer_reviews.text: Really like the shoe. Great comfort. I didn’t realize that you cannot wear socks with them. You can get a small thin footie sock to wear with it. Mainly a summer shoe. Very comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: Love these, very comfortable and light, very happy with my purchase and super happy because the delivery was so fast, will order again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Opening too small to get a foot into!
customer_reviews.text: Opening just way too small to get your foot into it? Don't know why it would be made so small.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Bernhard Thyne

customer_reviews.title: Looks great feels awful
customer_reviews.text: I love the weight and the look but I have worn them once and the shoe rubbed my ankle so hard it made me bleed
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany cook

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves how they are so lightweight and comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: It is see through and the shoe is very tight around the ankle.
customer_reviews.author: tammy trader

customer_reviews.title: Very difficult to put on. The opening doesn't stretch ...
customer_reviews.text: Very difficult to put on. The opening doesn't stretch so that you can get your foot in the shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Patti Broome

customer_reviews.title: I recommend going 2 sizes up
customer_reviews.text: I went a size up on my size and it's still way too small for me. I recommend going 2 sizes up.
customer_reviews.author: Hailey Wroten

customer_reviews.title: Horrible fit!
customer_reviews.text: I’m a normal size 10. This shoes felt like an 8!
customer_reviews.author: Ken S.

customer_reviews.title: Couldn’t even get the shoe on my foot very easily. Took way too much effort to get it ...
customer_reviews.text: Couldn’t even get the shoe on my foot very easily. Took way too much effort to get it on. Digest even have any stretch.
customer_reviews.author: Micheala Nichols

customer_reviews.title: I were ordered size 9 for that shoes but when ...
customer_reviews.text: I were ordered size 9 for that shoes but when i took it , it smaller although it’s size 9
customer_reviews.author: Hieu Chau

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: did not like the top of the shoe at all not my kind of shoe
customer_reviews.author: sylvia

customer_reviews.title: Opening it is way too small.
customer_reviews.text: Terrible shoes. The opening is way too small and I have a narrow foot to begin with.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: HATE THEM AWFUL
customer_reviews.text: Awful they suck , NOT ORIGINAL , Small, Not as described on the post, too thin..
customer_reviews.author: alejandra varela

customer_reviews.title: Love Under Armour products
customer_reviews.text: Love Under Armour products, hated these shoes! Grabbed them during a sale price bc I couldn't pass them up BUT when they arrived, I quickly sent them back. They are a slip on shoe style vs a normal sneaker, doesn't even have a tongue. Therefore, I couldn't even get them on my feet easily. The style wasn't my cup of tea either. Ugly!
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: GREAT
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. I was looking for some sneakers that were on the minimal end as far as bulk and material, and these are PERFECT. i don't like tennis shoes that are super bulky, just something light and easy on my feet. I absolutely love these. They fit like a glove!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Lewis

customer_reviews.title: My feet love them
customer_reviews.text: These sneakers wrap around my feet very nicely. Comfortable toe box.
customer_reviews.author: Karuna

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My feet are not easy to fit but I love the way the shoes look and feel.
customer_reviews.author: ZeusMom

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I didn't do my due diligence and read the reviews before placing these in my husband's cart for my Christmas present. I have a few pair of UA shoes so I thought these would be fine, but I thought wrong. I have a very thin foot and cannot for the life of me get the left one on, there is no tongue so if you can't cram your foot in the opening- you're screwed. The right one goes on after about 5 minutes of struggle. It's a shame because they are cute and the right one fits well once on, but I will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: James

product_meta.title: Under Armour Men's Women's Charged CoolSwitch Run Shoe
product_meta.description: UA CoolSwitch lining uses an exclusive coating on the inside that pulls heat away from your foot, making you feel cooler & able to run longer .Slip on lightweight, stretch upper delivers a precision fit & enhanced breathability .Traditional lacing system with pull tabs for easy entry .Perforated sockliner provides underfoot ventilation to keep the foot cool .Two-piece Charged Cushioning midsole uses compressed foam for even greater responsiveness & durability, providing optimal cushioning & energy return .Full ventilation continued from outsole through the midsole allowing for the ultimate cooling system .Strategically placed rubber traction covers high impact zones of outsole for greater durability with less weight .Offset: 8 mm .Weight: 5.85 oz. .
feature_bullets: UA CoolSwitch lining uses an exclusive coating on the inside that pulls heat away from your foot, making you feel cooler & able to run longer
Slip on lightweight, stretch upper delivers a precision fit & enhanced breathability
Traditional lacing system with pull tabs for easy entry
Perforated sockliner provides underfoot ventilation to keep the foot cool
Two piece Charged Cushioning midsole uses compressed foam for even greater responsiveness & durability
